title: Leaf and the Tree final line

content.prompt: In context, the final line of the poem (“Crawls . . . sleep”) most plausibly suggests both the

choices.label: value of companionship and the solitude of death
necessity for dreams and the danger of illusions
hope for growth and the inescapable nature of origins
finality of death and the cyclical nature of life

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
